name: NoTime (90DegreeGames)
description:
One day Norman woke-up and he noticed that he is trapped in time. In order to escape he must restore the Tree Of Time by collecting the hourglasses that are scattered around his house.

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows to move,
Use UP to jump,
Collect hourgalsses to add more time to your clock.
You can use your time to buy gadgets that will help you explore the level, use your time wisely.

Good Luck!

This game was made for a game jam :)
